content.introduction: SENNA stands for "Sentiment Analysis" and is a small web application to experiment with cloud-based News Search and Text Analysis APIs
content.description: Ayrton SENNA da Silva was a Brazilian racing driver who won Formula One world championships for McLaren in 1988, 1990 and 1991, and who is widely regarded as one of the greatest Formula One drivers of all time.
